issue.title: [C++][Python] Support casting an Extension type to its storage type
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7858](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7858). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently, casting an extension type will always fail: "No cast implemented from extension<arrow.py_extension_type> to ...".

However, for casting, we could fall back to the storage array's casting rules?
